definition: square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively

sentences.english: Mr Wang matched families from the two surveys according to their Engel’s coefficients.
sentences.chinese: 王曉魯根據恩格爾係數將兩項調查的家庭匹配起來。

sentences.english: One of the first students to receive an MA in creative writing was Paul Engle .
sentences.chinese: 第一個學生獲得碩士創作是保羅恩格爾。

sentences.english: Engelbart's invention went on to be used by millions of people around the world every day.
sentences.chinese: 每天恩格爾巴特的發明都被全世界數百萬人所使用。

sentences.english: The President's commonsense approach captured the Court's intent in Engel.
sentences.chinese: 總統的一番情理之言表達了法院對恩格爾案的本意。
